channel.title: The Annoying Kid(Class Suggestion)
channel.description:
The Annoying Kid-Neutral-Special Passive 1-Annoying-Only one vote away from being put on stand(They dont see the votes but they are there),immune to occupy and immune at night Passive 2-Salty AF-If put on trial be immediately pardoned and kill everyone of the faction the person who voted you up Day ability 1-Revenge-If poisoned kill all the unseen,If bled kill all the cult(Or all the BD if the hunter wolfed you)-1 use Day ability 2-HAHAHAH-Erase someones journal- infinite uses Night ability 1-Catch me?-If jailed leave the cell and kill all the BD(Usable in jail)-1 use Night ability 2-HAHAHAHA-If the anyone of a certain faction tries to target you,kill all the members of the faction of the player that targeted you-infinite uses (If your bleeding to hunter you kill all the BD)(Yes you would kill all the neutrals if they voted you up) Win condition-Kill everyone of a certain faction Totally balanced.......
Totally doesnt punish you on N1 randomness.... Thinking-Scenario-Sheriff invests him N1 Kills all the BD by doing so

Agreed so lets call over X-Blade and have him implement this into the game.

item.title: The Annoying Kid(Class Suggestion)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Duh. Just roleblock them the night you try to kill them. Or just wolf them (Kills all cult. Good thing your BD). Knight + Butler, Assassin + Servant. CL + Invoker. Too UP needs night Immunity and Occupy immunity.

Read full topic

item.title: The Annoying Kid(Class Suggestion)
item.dc:creator: DeathReaperRH
item.description:
The Annoying Kid-Neutral-Special
Passive 1-Annoying-Only one vote away from being put on stand(They dont see the votes but they are there),immune to occupy and immune at night
Passive 2-Salty AF-If put on trial be immediately pardoned and kill everyone of the faction the person who voted you up
Day ability 1-Revenge-If poisoned kill all the unseen,If bled kill all the cult(Or all the BD if the hunter wolfed you)-1 use
Day ability 2-HAHAHAH-Erase someones journal- infinite uses
Night ability 1-Catch me?-If jailed leave the cell and kill all the BD(Usable in jail)-1 use
Night ability 2-HAHAHAHA-If the anyone of a certain faction tries to target you,kill all the members of the faction of the player that targeted you-infinite uses
(If your bleeding to hunter you kill all the BD)(Yes you would kill all the neutrals if they voted you up)
Win condition-Kill everyone of a certain faction
Totally balanced…

Totally doesnt punish you on N1 randomness…
Thinking-Scenario-Sheriff invests him N1
Kills all the BD by doing so

Read full topic
